all_questions.question: What is the main current use of word alignment?
all_questions.context: So we are closely coming to the end.

all_questions.question: Why were word alignments problematic from a linguistic point of view?
all_questions.context: The main use before NeuralMT came was to use the word alignments in phrase-based machine translation.

all_questions.question: What technique was proposed to move from word alignment to true phrase alignment?
all_questions.context: So there was a technique how to move from word alignment to true phrase alignment based on the phrase-based model.

all_questions.question: Why did people not adopt this technique for word alignment to phrase alignment?
all_questions.context: But it didn't bring enough improvement in translation quality.

all_questions.question: What was the main issue with probabilities in word alignments before NeuralMT came?
all_questions.context: So the probabilities were kind of ill-defined.
